Name: Eduardo I. Juárez Leal
Sumário:
I am highly passionate about my work with technology and can bridge the gap between a technical and non-technical environment.  As a dedicated and enthusiastic accredited senior executive IT professional, I specialize in IT management, business engagement, strategic development and process improvement.

I hold extensive experience of working in the tactical and strategic planning with focus on new ventures, business development and use of differentiated solutions. While working with the latest in industry developments I also demonstrate a logical and analytical approach to solving complex problems and issues. My experience has been collected in different industries although during the past six years I have been happily working for a global FMCG.

As an effective Project Manager and responsible for a full portfolio, I can work on multiple, simultaneous programs; consistently delivering projects on time and to budget with above satisfactory results from project start, monitoring, completion and closure with appropriate reporting of KPIs.

My excellent interpersonal and communication skills provide me with the ability to develop and maintain positive internal and external relationships.  As a strong team leader, I coordinate medium-large multicultural and multifunctional teams.  I thrive in highly pressurised and challenging working environments while also can engage board level buy-in for the influencing of key business decisions for cost saving, increased profitability and enhanced productivity.

Should you be interested in discussing further, don’t hesitate to contact me at eduardo.juarez@gmail.com

**
Nome: IBM 
Localização: Hortolândia 
Descrição: A execução dos testes faz parte das ferramentas de distribuição do IBM Maximo, ServiceNow (todas as versões) e Maximo Standard Reports.
Teste de Qualidade Racional do Rational Team Concert e do Rational Quality Manager para rastrear e executar os testes.

- ISM Maximo: O objetivo do ICD QuickStart é padronizar as instancias do ICD com um pacote globalmente aprovado de ISM que reduz o tempo de implementação e, portanto, o custo de implementação do pacote de ferramentas do ISM.
- ServiceNow: O objetivo do QuickStart ServiceNow é fornecer as especificações e oferecer suporte às Competências Globais de Entrega de TI para Incident, Problem, Change e Service Catalog.
- Relatórios BIRT / Cognos: relatórios são desenvolvidos para fornecer informações sobre o uso do software, em vez de usar as novas ferramentas para uso nas ferramentas.
